Job Posting: 176546 - Position: S26 Web Developer - Co-op/Intern (28904) 176546 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/16/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/06/2026 02:13 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nokia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Canada (Hybrid) 2026 - Summer S26 Web Developer - Co-op/Intern (28904) 176546 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $41,184 to $91,184 per year Position: Web Developer - Co-op/Intern Number of Position(s): 1 Duration: 4 Months + Date: May 4 - August 28, 2026 (Summer Term) Location: Hybrid in Ottawa Office EDUCATIONAL RECOMMENDATIONS Currently a candidate for a master's or bachelor's degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, or a related field with an accredited school in Canada. Your responsibilities As part of our team, you will: • Assist in designing and implementing web GUI features - built with React and Redux • Be exposed and learn cutting-edge network technologies in the fields of SDN • Interacting with User Experience experts to deliver modern, easy-to-use enterprise-grade applications • Work in a team-based Agile Environment; work with Developers, Testers, and Product Management to refine requirements, develop, and test our products. Interact with Support Teams to provide software solutions to field-reported issues. • Job Requirements Your skills and experience • Proficiency in JavaScript, React, HTML5, CSS3 • Experience in application state management eg: Redux It would be nice if you also had: • Familiarity with react component libraries such as ag-grid, formik, styled-components • Experience working with package managers like npm • Strong knowledge of REST API Experience with Git • Citizenship Requirement Position Start Date Position End Date N/A May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 28, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions APPLICATION LINK: https://jobs.nokia.com/en/sites/CX_1/job/28904 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
